Jiraiya and Naruto, the latter who is in Sage Mode, use the Frog Kata to uppercut the opponent.

== Trivia ==
* Despite the Frog Kata requiring the use of senjutsu chakra, Jiraiya was able to perform this technique without entering Sage Mode.
